mapper.select: select assignmentNo, assignmentTitle, assignmentContent, courseNo, courseName, subjectNo, subjectTitle, chapterNo, chapterContent, teacherNo, TO_CHAR(startDate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as endDate, email, userName, logoPath, su.scheduleNo scheduleNo, fileNo from (select assignmentNo, assignmentTitle, assignmentContent, csc.courseNo courseNo, courseName, csc.subjectNo subjectNo, subjectTitle, csc.chapterNo chapterNo, chapterContent, teacherNo, scheduleNo, fileNo from (select courseNo, courseName, ch.subjectNo subjectNo, subjectTitle, chapterNo, chapterContent from (select s.courseNo courseNo, courseName, subjectNo, subjectTitle from course c join subject s on c.courseNo = s.courseNo where c.courseNo = #{courseNo}) cs join chapter ch on cs.subjectNo = ch.subjectNo) csc join assignment a on csc.chapterNo = a.chapterNo) acsc join (select scheduleNo, startDate, endDate, u.userNo userNo, email, userName, logoPath from schedule s join users u on s.userNo = u.userNo) su on acsc.scheduleNo = su.scheduleNo
